Have you ever launch an aircraft and tunrs to one side and crash with the light of the end of runway? Well, i have and idea to solve it!

On a carrier, the planes use a catapult that holds one gear and gives the plane extra velocity...

that doesn't matter but the clue is that avoid any unexpected turn on the runway...

Is very difficult make any like this? I need it!
Make sure your two back wheels are as straight as possible according to the ground, if you place them in a 15 degree angle on ground contact the wheel tends to turn
Also, if you have a usual one-in-the-front/two-in-the-back configuration for your landing gear, try to place the back two very near behind the Center of Mass.
